items.sentence: Tom isn\'t the kind of person who would do something like that.
Tom knew he didn\'t have enough time to do what had to be done.
Didn\'t you tell me yesterday that you wouldn\'t be late today?
Don\'t blame yourself for what happened. It wasn\'t your fault.
Dream as if you\'ll live forever. Live as if you\'ll die today.
Tom told Mary he wasn\'t interested in helping her do anything.
Tom told me he didn\'t recognize Mary the last time he saw her.
Let\'s get together for dinner the next time you\'re in Boston.
Tom pretended he didn\'t understand what Mary wanted him to do.
Tom couldn\'t remember whether or not he\'d turned off the gas.
